name: Imperatives to drive down energy use
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: This session looks at all the drivers for upgrading non-domestic buildings to reduce energy use and covers cost savings and property values, regulations, carbon savings, carbon taxes and rising fuel prices.

presentations.name: Improving energy efficiency - the property context
presentations.speakers: Jon Lovell, Head of Sustainability, Drivers Jonas Deloitte

presentations.name: Impact of regulations on the drivers to undertake energy efficiency measures
presentations.speakers: Roddy Langmuir, Senior Partner, Cullinan Studio Architects

presentations.name: Cost savings, carbon taxes and the business case for upgrading non-domestic buildings
presentations.speakers: Nick Hayes, Head of Sustainability, EC Harris
